sentences.sContent: You will need the time to orient yourself to your new way of eating.
sentences.sCn: 你需要时间适应新的吃法。

sentences.sContent: You will need the time to orient yourself to your new way of eating.
sentences.sCn: 你需要时间适应新的吃法。

synos.tran: 使适应；确定方向；使朝东

remMethod.val: ori(升起) ＋ ent → 太阳升起的地方 → 东方

words.tran: 导向的；定向的；以…为方向的
方向；定向；适应；情况介绍；向东方
调整；使朝向（orient的过去分词）；确定…的方位

trans.tranOther: When you orient yourself to a new situation or course of action, you learn about it and prepare to deal with it

trans.tranCn: 使适应，使熟悉情况；使朝向，以…为方向
trans.tranOther: When you orient yourself to a new situation or course of action, you learn about it and prepare to deal with it

trans.tranCn: 东方， 亚洲， 东半球
trans.tranOther: the eastern part of the world, especially China and Japan
